amendatorysection.catchline: Arrest of judgment; defect of form insufficient.
amendatorysection.para: No judgment can be arrested for a defect of form.

annotation.para: A defendant who pleads not guilty without having raised the question of the lack of or a defective verification waives the defect. State v. Gilman, 181 Neb. 390, 148 N.W.2d 847 (1967).
